Let's Talk

Terms of Use for Any Graphics Today

Acceptance of Terms

Welcome to Any Graphics Today, a specialized graphic design wing of Logo In Hours LLC. We provide premier graphic design services across the United States, focusing on business branding without requiring an upfront charge. By accessing or using our services through https://anygraphicstoday.com, you agree to these Terms of Use, our Privacy Policy, and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you are prohibited from using our services.

Description of Service

Any Graphics Today offers graphic design services based entirely on the client's vision and ideas. We are committed to translating these visions into design realities without any upfront charges. Our service process includes design conceptualization, client review, and approval before invoicing. Once a design is approved and the invoice is paid, all payments are final and non-refundable.

Intellectual Property Rights

Ownership and Licensing:

All designs and creative works produced by Any Graphics Today as a result of any commissioned project remain the property of Any Graphics Today until full payment for the completed project has been received. Upon receipt of full payment, ownership of the produced designs and creative works (the "Designs") is transferred to the client.

Pre-Payment Rights:

Prior to the receipt of full payment, all intellectual property rights in any Designs created by Any Graphics Today remain the exclusive property of Any Graphics Today. During this period, Any Graphics Today grants the client a provisional, non-exclusive, and non-transferable license to review and approve the Designs strictly for the purpose of the client's evaluation and approval process.

Post-Payment Rights:

Upon full payment, Any Graphics Today transfers to the client all ownership rights to the Designs, subject to the following conditions:

  • The client is granted a worldwide, non-exclusive license to use the Designs for their business branding and other lawful purposes.
  • The transfer of ownership is contingent upon the client's responsibility to secure proper copyright registration for the Designs if they intend to use the Designs commercially. This is to ensure that the client's use of the Designs complies with all applicable copyright laws and protections.
  • While Any Graphics Today transfers ownership of the Designs to the client upon full payment, we do not provide any warranty or representation regarding the originality of the Designs or their suitability for copyright registration. The client assumes all responsibility for obtaining legal advice to secure copyright or other intellectual property protections as required.

Responsibility and Liability:

The client acknowledges that it is their responsibility to ensure that the Designs do not infringe upon the intellectual property rights of third parties. Any Graphics Today is not liable for any claims, damages, or legal costs associated with the client's use of the Designs in violation of another party's intellectual property rights.

Client's Due Diligence:

The client agrees to perform due diligence in reviewing the Designs provided by Any Graphics Today to ensure that they meet the client's requirements and do not infringe upon any third party's rights. Any Graphics Today is committed to cooperating with the client to address any concerns or adjustments required prior to the final approval and payment.

User Obligations

As a user, you agree to provide accurate and complete information about your vision and ideas for your graphic design needs. You understand that the quality and relevance of the designs provided byAny Graphics Today depend significantly on the clarity and completeness of the information you provide.

No Upfront Charges; Payment and Refund Policy

  • No Upfront Charges: We do not require any upfront payment for initiating a design project.
  • Payment: Once a design is approved by you, we will issue an invoice for the agreed amount. Payment is due upon receipt of the invoice.
  • No Refunds:After payment has been made, we do not offer refunds under any circumstances.

Limitation of Liability

Any Graphics Today and its designers shall not be liable for any claims, damages, or liabilities arising from the use of the designs created, including but not limited to any direct, indirect, incidental, punitive, and consequential damages. We act solely as a conduit for your graphic design visions and ideas. The responsibility for the legal compliance of the design with regards to copyright, trademarks, and other intellectual property rights rests with you, the client.

Disclaimer of Warranties

The services provided by Any Graphics Today are on an "as is" and "as available" basis. Any Graphics Today makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims all other warranties, including without limitation, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.

Amendment of Terms

Any Graphics Today reserves the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. By continuing to access or use our services after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.

Governing Law

These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your State], United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

Contact Information

These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your State], United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. info@anygraphicstoday.com
